```{r}
ac <- create_api_config()
a <- get_jobs(ac)
b <- get_jobs(ac, users = "Dreznel")
c <- get_jobs(ac, users = c("Dreznel", "John Carlo"))
d <- get_jobs(ac, statuses = "ERROR")
e <- get_jobs(ac, statuses = c("COMPLETED","ERROR"))
f <- get_jobs(ac, statuses = c("COMPLETED"))

a
b
c
d
e
f
```
